name: AspNetCoreHealthCheckReleaseGate
friendlyName: Asp.Net Core Health Check Release Gate
description: Azure DevOps release gate based on Asp.Net Core Health Checks.
author: lfraile
instanceNameFormat: Asp.Net Core Health Check Release Gate

groups.name: aspNetCoreHealthCheckEndpoint
groups.displayName: Asp.Net Core Health Check endpoint information

inputs.name: aspNetCoreHealthCheckUri
inputs.label: Url configured for Asp.Net Core Health Check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url configured in Asp.Net Core Health Check to get general checks

inputs.name: aspNetCoreHealthCheckCheck
inputs.label: Name of check to verify
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the configured check in Asp.Net Core Health Check to verify. Needs [AspNetCore.HealthChecks.UI](https://www.nuget.org/packages/AspNetCore.HealthChecks.UI/) package.

inputs.name: aspNetCoreHealthCheckText
inputs.label: Value of healthy response for the check to verify
inputs.helpMarkDown: Text to check when for **Healthy** Health Check when verifying particular checks. By default is **Healthy**. Needs [AspNetCore.HealthChecks.UI](https://www.nuget.org/packages/AspNetCore.HealthChecks.UI/) package.
